fields.name: Embellished Beige Bridal Maxi
fields.description: A premium unstitched formal wear dress in a luxurious beige net fabric, heavily adorned with sequins, zari, and hand embroidery. Ideal for bridal wear or high-end formal events. The set includes the front, back, sleeves, dupatta, and trouser fabric – ready to be stitched to your custom measurements.
fields.shirt_details:
Front: Embroidered net panel
Back: Embroidered net panel
Sleeves: Embroidered net fabric
Dupatta: Matching net with heavy borders and motifs
Pouch: Matching fabric (optional accessory)
Extras: Embellishment patches / borders included (if applicable)
fields.trouser_details:
Plain or lightly embroidered fabric (likely included)

Fabric type: Jamawar / raw silk / crepe (confirm as per package)
fields.fabric: Shirt: Embroidered net  Dupatta: Embroidered net  Trouser: Raw silk or similar
fields.care_instructions:
Dry clean only – due to delicate embroidery and fabric.

Do not machine wash or tumble dry.

Store in a cool, dry place, preferably in a garment bag.

Iron on low heat from the reverse side using a cloth barrier.

Avoid direct contact with perfumes or deodorants to maintain embellishments.
fields.disclaimer:
Product color may slightly vary due to photographic lighting or screen resolution.

This is an unstitched dress, and images shown are for styling reference only.

Accessories (e.g., pouch, jewelry) shown in the image may or may not be included unless mentioned.

Embellishments and embroidery patterns may have minor variations based on availability.

fields.description: Elevate your daily wardrobe with our Red Carmine ensemble, featuring shirts adorned with delicate pleats detailing and playful fringes paired with stylish bottoms. The rich Red Carmine hue adds a vibrant and passionate flair, while the pleats patterns and frills create a captivating ensemble that effortlessly transitions from day to night. Step into each day with confidence and style, embracing the charm of Red Carmine with our thoughtfully designed shirts and bottoms.

fields.name: Open Frock and Lehenga
fields.shirt_details:
The Pakistani Frock in open style has an alluring lilac shade and an organza fabric. This beautiful Pishwas Frock is hand-embellished with pearls, sequins, and motifs. Lavish zardosi and embroidery give a traditional look to the Pakistani Wedding Dress.

Organza Dupatta:
The Lehenga Frock is paired with a delicate dupatta in organza to give a final royal touch to this beautiful attire. Gold lacework on this organza dupatta make it a perfect choice for this Lehenga Dress.
fields.trouser_details: The Pishwas Frock is paired with Lehenga to create a ravishing Pakistani Wedding Dress. The Lehenga comes in jamawar fabric and it is gracefully adorned with classic goldwork.

fields.name: Gharara Set
fields.shirt_details: Designer Pakistani Bridal Dress in Lilac Kameez Lehenga Style is a stunning masterpiece adorned with cut-dana, sequins, stones, and pearls.

fields.name: Evadine Neue
fields.description: A richly adorned lilac crop jacket embellished with sequins and intricate thread work in vibrant pink and white hues, paired with metallic flared peshwas. The ensemble is completed with a floral color-blocked dupatta, featuring zardozi and sequin detailing, along with embroidered borders at the ends.

fields.name: Bridal Dress in Lilac Kameez Lehenga Style
fields.shirt_details:
Pakistani Bridal Kameez come in elegant lilac color and is gracefully emblazoned with shimmering sequins, stones, cut-dana, and pearls. The A-line Kameez is fully embellished with intricate embroidery work and floral designs, making this kameez an epitome of beauty and grace.
Pakistani Bridal Dress in Lehenga Kameez style achieves the final ravishing look when paired with a delicate dupatta in net. Embellished borders, beads, stones, sequins, pearls, and silverwork make this dupatta a perfect choice for this Pakistani Bridal Outfit.
fields.trouser_details: The Bridal Lehenga has premium quality raw silk fabric and it looks perfect when paired with the heavily embellished pure organza kameez. The borders of this Lehenga are adorned with embroidery and threads, making it a breathtaking choice for the wedding.

Ornamented with an artsy blend of ethnic and hand embellishments with tone of green flashy sequins detailing with richly embellished border. Richly embellished border adds a touch of luxe to entire look of this fit.

fields.name: Deeya
fields.description:
Introducing "Deeya", a classical yet contemporary ensemble in midnight blue from our collection.
This ensemble features a short kameez with heavily embroidered gharara in chiffon. The full-sleeved kameez is simple and elegant, with scattered sequin work on the front and sleeves, and detailed threadwork and zari work on the hems. The combination of delicate silver embellishments on a midnight blue base symbolizes
stars on a night sky. Contrasting the kameez. the lehnga is much more detailed with heavy zari work and threadwork in silver, which makes the ensemble stand out. "Deeya" is completed with a beautiful chiffon dupatta, with detailed borders and scattered sequins.

fields.name: Hand-embellished Party Wear
fields.shirt_details:
﻿This Long Kameez comes in premium quality net in blush pink color making this Girl Dress Pakistani look even more soulful. This Long Kameez is stunningly emblazoned with fine embroidery, tilla, stones, dabka and zardozi making this dress look exquisite. Furthermore, beautiful bell-shaped sleeves are triggering the entire diaphanous look.
Dupatta: This Girls Dress Pakistani is paired with an ethereal yet magnificent hot pink dupatta. The fabric of this dupatta is chiffon and is heavily emblazoned with thread work and metallic threadwork elaborated by sequins, pearls, and gotta making this Pakistani Dress look traditional.,
fields.trouser_details: This Long kameez comes with a matching hot pink bottom that can be stitched according to the demand and size of the customer of the value. A salwar, trousers, sharara, culottes or cigarette pants can be made according to your choice. These trousers come with an embellished organza Patti patch.

fields.name: Hot Pink Lace Designer Suit (Replica)
fields.description:
Hot Pink Multi Embroidered Pakistani Pant Style Suit features kurta and pant suit with classic look for wedding season. This set is enhanced with multi resham thread, golden zari, lace and sequence work embroidery on organza silk top paired with silk pants bottom and lining. The unique part is it’s traditional embroidery and tassel enhanced organza silk dupatta. Wear this set weddings or festivities with a pair of heels and golden jewellery to have a desi girl look.

The set contains a straight cut top, pants bottom and a dupatta.
This is the best choice to wear on festivals and on wedding parties.
Embellished neckline, sleeves and daman with sequence, lace, golden zari and resham thread work.

fields.name: Serene Elegance: Sky Blue Embroidered Lawn Suit
fields.description: Step into grace with this ethereal sky blue lawn suit featuring delicate thread buttons and a beautifully scalloped dupatta. The soft hue radiates calmness while the subtle detailing on the sleeves and dupatta border adds a touch of sophistication. Perfect for summer soirées, Eid gatherings, or a breezy festive look. Pair with minimal jewelry for a timeless, graceful vibe.

fields.name: Meher Royal Purple Hand Embroidered silk Anarkali Set
fields.description: Crafted from premium fabric in a rich royal purple, the Anarkali kurta with hijab features full sleeves adorned with sequins and bead work for a regal effect. The bodice and neckline showcase heavy embroidery in floral motifs, elevated by bead and sequins accents and thread work that add depth and shimmer. Comes paired with a matching churidar bottom, hijab and a organza dupatta with mirror-embroidered buttis and an ornate scalloped border. The V-neckline and floor-length flare create a silhouette that flatters every body type and makes an unforgettable statement. This anarkali suit can be customised up to maximum size available in inches 69. Slight color variation may occur due to photographic reasons.

fields.name: Zaaviay Pareesa Arzish Raw Silk Luxury
A Unique and Captivating 3-piece Hand-worked Copper Raw Silk Dress
fields.shirt_details:
A unique dress for our unique customers.

This breathtaking 3-piece Hand-worked Copper Raw Silk Dress is made with the best Fabric. A metallic copper color makes this a wonderful addition to your Eid Wardrobe. 

Perfect Handwork curves around a beautiful neckline giving a beautiful image of golden flowers and vines in bloom. The shirt is divided at the hem to add to the unique designs of this amazing outfit.

A soft and light Organza dupatta, made simply with elegant laces to enrich the design of the outfit.

Paired with simple matching raw silk trousers.

fields.name: Brown Color Party Wear Readymade Pakistani Salwar Suits with Pant & Dupatta
Brown Georgette Embroidered Wedding Anarkali Suit
fields.description:
Featuring beautiful embroidery, this Brown Georgette Anarkali Suit Which will make you absolutely astoundingly gorgeous and that will be least interesting thing about you. This Closed neck and Full Sleeves clothing designed with resham, zari, aari, hand, thread and embroidered work.

Completed with Santoon Churidar in Brown Color with Brown Chiffon Dupatta. Dupatta designed with Stone and Hand Work.

This Anarkali Suit can be customized up to size 44 Inches around the Bust.
